creator: kroll@alltel.net
text:
I believe there is a bug in the Jasper source file runtime/JspRuntimeLibrary.java. In the 
include() method there is a call to out.flush(). The problem is that out may be a BodyContent 
object which is prohibited from being flushed and immediately throws an exception. I changed 
this to read

        if (flush && !(out instanceof BodyContent))
            out.flush();

and my 
problems were solved.
Fixed in 20011205 nightly build.  Thanks kroll@alltel.net for the patch
